title: Health Monitoring Support
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health-monitoring devices so that I can track my vital signs and receive updates on my health status without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Emergency Alert System
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to quickly notify my caregivers or emergency services in case of a health crisis or fall, so that I can feel safe and secure while maintaining my independence.

title: Medication Management System
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my medications and receive reminders for intake and refills so that I can manage my health independently without feeling monitored.

title: Caregiver Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregivers to be able to access my health data and medication schedules so that I can receive better support and stay informed about my health.

title: Personalized Health Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to analyze my health data and provide personalized health and wellness recommendations so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and continue my active lifestyle.

title: Health Progress Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my health progress over time so that I can visualize changes in my health metrics and receive motivational feedback.
